narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Epicmd Technologies LLC is a Transportation Network Company provider based in Miami, FL. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $54.9M in Medicaid payments across 4.8M claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $54.9M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
